home.title: Backend Software Engineer

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Backend Engineer
about.description: I'm a passionate backend engineer specializing in building robust, scalable server-side systems and APIs. I focus on designing efficient architectures, optimizing performance, and ensuring reliable data flow that powers modern applications.
about.description2: With strong problem-solving skills and a curious mindset, I enjoy tackling complex backend challenges and believe I can be a valuable asset to any development team.

experience.title: Experience
experience.overview: Sep 2022 - Sep 2025: Backend Engineer at DNSEver Inc. / Probit Global Exchange

lims.title: Payment Platform Leadership
lims.summary: Architected BuyCrypto platform using Node.js/NestJS, collaborating with cross-functional teams and 10+ global payment providers to process 10,000+ monthly transactions with 99.8% success rate.
lims.description_1: Built fault-tolerant worker system with automated crypto transfers, reducing manual processing by 85% through MSA architecture.
lims.description_2: Implemented comprehensive Jest unit testing (90%+ coverage) and CI/CD pipelines for zero-downtime deployments.
lims.description_3: Collaborated with cross-functional teams and integrated with 10+ global payment providers to ensure high transaction success rates.

cogthera_backend.title: Notification & Real-time Infrastructure
cogthera_backend.summary: Built scalable notification service using NestJS and gRPC, handling 50K+ daily messages via Redis-based queue system with 99.9%+ delivery rate.
cogthera_backend.description_1: Created real-time pub/sub infrastructure using Redis for live candlestick charts and developed high-performance WebSocket services.
cogthera_backend.description_2: Supporting 10K+ concurrent users with sub-100ms latency and streaming 500+ messages/second.
cogthera_backend.description_3: Collaborated with application client teams for seamless integration and optimal performance.
cogthera_backend.description_4: Enhanced system efficiency and performance optimization.
cogthera_backend.description_5: Built secure aggregation service using FastAPI and WebSockets for real-time dashboard data.
cogthera_backend.description_6: Self-hosted Sentry for error monitoring, providing timely incident detection and streamlined debugging processes.
cogthera_backend.description_7: Led development of asynchronous services leveraging cloud storage for performance optimization.

mobile_app.title: Testing & DevOps
mobile_app.summary: Implemented comprehensive Jest unit testing achieving 90%+ code coverage across microservices with automated CI/CD pipelines.
mobile_app.description_1: Implemented CI/CD pipeline setup with automated deployments on GitLab to AWS cloud infrastructure.
mobile_app.description_2: Collaborated with DevOps team for zero-downtime releases using Docker/Kubernetes.
mobile_app.description_3: Set up monitoring via Grafana and Datadog for comprehensive system observability.

experience.description: My professional journey and work experience.

openToWork.title: Looking for New Opportunities
openToWork.description: Open to exciting new roles and challenges in software development

meta.intro: A modern content creation platform with AI capabilities

contentPlatform.title: Content Creation Platform
contentPlatform.summary: Led the development of a Next.js content platform that transformed content creation with AI capabilities.
description: Built and optimized a Next.js platform (App Router with Server Components/Actions), integrating OpenAI and Google APIs for content management and secure cloud storage.
Streamlined content creation workflows by implementing a block-based WYSIWYG editor with Tiptap.
Orchestrated complex business logic around content generation and management, ensuring robust content tracking and seamless user experiences.

contentGenServer.title: Content Generation Server
contentGenServer.summary: Developed and maintained a microservice-based content generation server with AI capabilities.
description: Designed and implemented a microservice-based backend architecture ensuring high performance and scalability.
Implemented audit logging using PostgreSQL triggers and integrated OAuth 2.0 for secure user management.
Built a secure content generation service using FastAPI and WebSockets for real-time updates.
Self-hosted monitoring tools for error tracking, providing timely incident detection and streamlined debugging processes.
Led the development of an asynchronous content generation server, leveraging caching in S3-compatible storage to optimize performance and cost.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: A selection of my personal projects.

dex.title: Decentralized Exchange (DEX) Platform
dex.summary: Full-stack DeFi trading platform with AMM smart contracts on zkSync testnet
description: Built full-stack DeFi trading platform with Next.js frontend and AMM smart contracts on zkSync testnet
Implemented token swaps and liquidity pools with automated testing using 25 trading bot personas
Optimized transaction costs to < $0.01 using Layer 2 scaling with sub-5s transaction speed
Deployed live contract at 0xA5F6bde4C85379fd7339805071901F367F58a1F2 on zkSync Sepolia

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio Website
portfolio.summary: Responsive portfolio showcasing professional projects and skills
description: Created a clean and modern portfolio site using Next.js, shadcn/ui, and Tailwind CSS to showcase professional projects and skill sets
Implemented multi-language support with English and Korean translations for international accessibility
